Uses of Class
wtf.choco.alchema.api.event.CauldronEvent

Packages that use CauldronEvent
Package Description
wtf.choco.alchema.api.event  

  • Uses of CauldronEvent in wtf.choco.alchema.api.event

    Subclasses of CauldronEvent in wtf.choco.alchema.api.event
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  CauldronBubbleEvent
    Called when an AlchemicalCauldron begins to bubble.
    class  CauldronIngredientAddEvent
    Called when an Item consumed by an AlchemicalCauldron and an ingredient is added to the cauldron.
    class  CauldronIngredientsDropEvent
    Called when a cauldron drops its ingredients in the world.
    class  CauldronItemCraftEvent
    Called when an AlchemicalCauldron has successfully prepared a crafting recipe.
